title: ENCODE Biosample
description: Schema for submitting an ENCODE Biosample

accession.comments: Not to be submitted or updated by non-admin users.
accession.title: Biosample Accession

description.description: A plain text description of the biosample

lab.comment: Automatic submitters can supply a Lab UUID or Name
lab.title: Lab

award.description: Award (Grant) this submission is registered under
award.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an Award UUID, name, or number
award.title: Award Name

term_id.description: Ontology term ID describing biosample type
term_id.comment: Valid ontologies for biosamples are: Uberon, EFO, BTO, or CL.  NTR is a new term request from ENCODE DCC.
term_id.title: Ontology ID

construct_list.comment: For automatic submission this is a list of unique references to construct objects.

items.description: Transfection, fusion, or shRNA construct name or uuid
items.title: Constructs

construct_list.title: List of Constructs

treatment.description: Substances used to treat a biosample
treatment.comment: For automatic submission supply unique treatment names or uuids
treatment.title: Biosample Treatment

protocol_document_list.description: List of biosample protocols associated with this biosample
protocol_document_list.comment: For automatic submission supply unique documents names or uuids
protocol_document_list.title: Protocol Document List

validation_document_list.description: List of validation protocols associated with this biosample (treatment)
validation_document_list.comment: For automatic submission supply unique documents names or uuids
validation_document_list.title: Validation Document List

donor.comment: For automatic submission, supply a ENCODE donor accession or uuid
donor.title: Donor

derived_from_list.description: List of biosamples this biosample is derived from
derived_from_list.title: List of Biosample Parents

items.description: Biosample that this sample derives from via a construct or treatment
items.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE biosample accession or uuid
items.title: Parent (derived_from) Biosample

contained_in_list.description: List of biosamples this biosample is contained in (reverse of pooled from)
contained_in_list.title: List of Biosample Parents

items.description: Biosample that this sample is contained in
items.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE biosample accession or uuid
items.title: Parent (contained_in) Biosample

part_of.description: List of biosamples this biosample part of
part_of.title: List of Biosample Parents

items.description: Biosample that this sample is part of
items.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE biosample accession or uuid
items.title: Parent (part_of) Biosample

source.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an ENCODE source UUID or unique Source name
source.title: Biosample Source

phase.description: Cell-cycle phase in which cells were harvested
phase.title: Cell-cycle phase

transfection_type.description: The in-cell longevity of the transfection construct (if it exists)
transfection_type.title: Transfection type (stability)
